Constructor Detail

TerritoryHurdleMission

public TerritoryHurdleMission(TerritoryManager territoryManager,
                              int territoryHurdle)
Creates a mission where a specific number of territories has to be conquered in order to win.

Covers missions like these:
Befreien Sie 24 Länder Ihrer Wahl!

Parameters:
territoryManager - Reference to the TerritoryManager
territoryHurdle - Amount of territories that have to be conquered

TerritoryHurdleMission

public TerritoryHurdleMission(TerritoryManager territoryManager,
                              int territoryHurdle,
                              int territoryUnitHurdle)
Creates a mission where a specific number of territories has to be conquered in order to win.
Also, a minimum amount of units on each territory has to be satisfied.

Covers missions like these:
Befreien Sie 18 Länder und setzen Sie in jedes Land mindestens 2 Armeen!

Parameters:
territoryManager - Reference to the TerritoryManager
territoryHurdle - Amount of territories that have to be conquered
territoryUnitHurdle - Minimum amount of units that has to be placed on each territory
